doc.field: Typescript: " 'This Ain't Ethiopia, But It'll Do': African-Americans and the Spanish Civil War," Robin D. G. Kelley (1990); also correspondence between Kelley and JB Typescripts: "Modern Spain: A Factual Outline," Lowry Field (1944); Partial list of volunteers in Lincoln and Washington Battalions: Brunete, Jarama Front Clippings re: Vaughan Love; Kenneth Frederick Nelson; Donald Rochon Maps: Jarama offensive; Brunete offensive; Aragon offensive Sheet music: "Tell It On and On!," Edith Segal (1974) Pamphlet: The Negro People and the Soviet Union,Paul Robeson (1950)
